_comment: IMPORTANT: Replace /Users/USERNAME with your actual home directory path (e.g., /Users/johndoe or /home/johndoe)
_note: Claude Code requires absolute paths for hooks. Do not use ~ or $HOME in the command paths.
name: Agent OS Bash Integration Hooks
description: First-class Claude Code background Bash integration via observation hooks

documentation.installation: Run the setup script which automatically installs hooks with correct absolute paths
documentation.manual_installation: Copy this file to ~/.claude/settings.json and replace USERNAME with your actual username
documentation.troubleshooting: Check /Users/USERNAME/.agent-os/logs/ for hook execution logs (replace USERNAME with your actual username)
